message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet halfway at $13,000? This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,500? I'm really interested in the product and I'm trying to make this work.
